alert.note: Alert for Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 11:41AM EST until January 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Rhode Island...Connecticut...Massachusetts... Pawcatuck River At Wood River Junction affecting Washington County. Pawcatuck River At Westerly affecting New London and Washington Counties. Sudbury River At Saxonville affecting Middlesex County. Charles River At Dover affecting Middlesex and Norfolk Counties. For the Sudbury River...including Saxonville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Charles River...including Dover...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pawcatuck River...including Wood River Junction, Westerly... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pawcatuck River at Wood River Junction. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Floodwaters begin to spread onto Driftwood Drive in Charlestown. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EST Thursday the stage was 5.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will remain near 5.0 this afternoon before dropping below flood stage tonight. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM EST.
